titles.title: Financial Services and General Government and National Security, Department of State, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2026
Financial Services and General Government and National Security, Department of State, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2026
National Security, Department of State, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2026
Making further consolidated appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
